show.title: How to Overcome Exam Anxiety
show.description: Intha show va neenga ketteenga naa Exams pathina ungaloda bayam, pathattam, stress ellaame kaanama Poidum. Ungaloda Exam Anxiety ya overcome panni confident ta exams sa face panna pala elimaiyaana practical tips intha audio show la irukkuüéØ. Miss Pannaama Kelungaüéß.
show.description_secondary: Intha show va neenga ketteenga naa Exams pathina ungaloda bayam, pathattam, stress ellaame kaanama Poidum. Ungaloda Exam Anxiety ya overcome panni confident ta exams sa face panna pala elimaiyaana practical tips intha audio show la irukkuüéØ. Miss Pannaama Kelungaüéß.
